alert.note: Alert for Covington; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 1:16PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Smith and north central Covington Counties through 215 PM CST... At 115 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mount Olive, or 9 miles southeast of Magee, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Taylorsville around 135 PM CST. Center Ridge around 140 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Sylvarena and Mize. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CST for central, southeastern and east central Mississippi.
